metadata.title: Principia Metaphysica Discovery Hash Registry
metadata.description: Cryptographic hash registry for intellectual property protection of key theoretical predictions
metadata.license: Registry format: MIT; Theory content: See DISCOVERY_PRIORITY.md

git_snapshot.author: andrewkwatts-maker <AndrewKWatts@gmail.com>
git_snapshot.message: Regenerate theory_output with experimental data loader
git_snapshot.note: All hashes computed from this git commit state

prediction.name: Dark Energy EOS Parameter w₀
prediction.significance: Derives w₀ = -11/13 ≈ -0.846 from dimensional reduction with 12-dimensional shadow spacetime. Testable prediction differing from ΛCDM (w₀ = -1).

discoveries.priority_claim: First derivation of dark energy EOS from G2 manifold geometry
discoveries.experimental_status: DESI 2025 measures w₀ = -0.827 ± 0.063 (1.3σ from PM prediction)

verification.instructions: Hash the 'prediction' field using SHA-256 to verify

prediction.name: Three Fermion Generations
prediction.significance: Derives exactly 3 generations from topology: n_gen = N_flux / spinor_DOF = 24 / 8 = 3. Parameter-free prediction.

discoveries.priority_claim: First topological derivation of generation count from TCS G2 manifold #187

verification.instructions: Hash the 'prediction' field using SHA-256 to verify

prediction.name: Proton Lifetime
prediction.significance: Predicts τ_p ≈ 4.8 × 10³⁴ years from GUT scale and geometric suppression. Testable by Hyper-Kamiokande.

discoveries.priority_claim: First prediction of proton lifetime from G2 geometric suppression mechanism
discoveries.experimental_status: Above Super-K bound (1.67 × 10³⁴ years). Awaiting Hyper-K measurements (2027+)

verification.instructions: Hash the 'prediction' field using SHA-256 to verify

prediction.name: GUT Unification Scale
prediction.significance: Derives M_GUT from geometric running of gauge couplings in G2 background.

discoveries.priority_claim: GUT scale derived from G2 holonomy constraints
discoveries.experimental_status: Consistent with standard GUT predictions (~10¹⁶ GeV)

verification.instructions: Hash the 'prediction' field using SHA-256 to verify

prediction.name: Cabibbo Angle from Geometry
prediction.significance: Predicts V_us = ε = exp(-λ) ≈ 0.223 from Froggatt-Nielsen suppression with λ = 1.5 (G2 curvature scale).

discoveries.priority_claim: First geometric derivation of Cabibbo angle from G2 curvature

verification.instructions: Hash the 'prediction' field using SHA-256 to verify

prediction.name: Jarlskog Invariant (CP Violation)
prediction.significance: Predicts J ≈ 3 × 10⁻⁵ from topological CP phase arising from K=4 matching fibres in TCS construction.

discoveries.priority_claim: First topological origin of CP violation from TCS matching conditions

verification.instructions: Hash the 'prediction' field using SHA-256 to verify

prediction.name: Yukawa Hierarchy Parameter
prediction.significance: Derives ε = exp(-1.5) ≈ 0.223 from G2 curvature scale, explaining fermion mass hierarchy.

discoveries.priority_claim: Geometric origin of Yukawa hierarchy from G2 parallel transport
discoveries.experimental_status: Explains observed hierarchies in quark and lepton masses

verification.instructions: Hash the 'prediction' field using SHA-256 to verify

prediction.name: Chiral Asymmetry Index
prediction.significance: Derives chiral index = χ_eff/24 = 144/24 = 6 from Atiyah-Singer theorem on TCS G2 #187.

discoveries.priority_claim: First application of Atiyah-Singer index theorem to TCS G2 manifolds for SM chirality
discoveries.experimental_status: Topological prediction, connects to observed fermion spectrum

verification.instructions: Hash the 'prediction' field using SHA-256 to verify

prediction.name: GUT Coupling Constant
prediction.significance: Derives α_GUT from RG running in G2 background with geometric corrections.

discoveries.priority_claim: G2 holonomy corrections to gauge coupling unification

verification.instructions: Hash the 'prediction' field using SHA-256 to verify

prediction.name: Shadow Dimension Parameter
prediction.significance: Derives D_eff from shadow spacetime breathing mode, connected to dark energy.

discoveries.priority_claim: Shadow spacetime dimension as source of dark energy

verification.instructions: Hash the 'prediction' field using SHA-256 to verify

verification_protocol.step_1: Clone the repository at the specified git commit
verification_protocol.step_3: Extract the prediction field from each entry
verification_protocol.step_4: Compute SHA-256 hash of canonical JSON (sorted keys)
verification_protocol.note: All hashes must match to verify registry integrity
